Attributes.description: Topics explore the social, cultural and global context of sport, exercise, physical activity, health, and the body.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Two of KIN 360, KIN 363, KIN 364, KIN 368, KIN 460, KIN 464, KIN 465, KIN 466, KIN 467. (Restricted to students in the BKIN program with fourth-year standing.)
